goal.en: This course aims to provide the students with training in analog circuit design. Content outline: The course is divided into two stages: 1) Firstly, do a summary review of the sophomore Electronics I & II two-semester courses, and strengthen the content of analog signal and circuit analysis in the two courses. 2) Discuss MOSFET components in depth and use them for analog integrated circuit design.
goal.ch: 本課程旨在為學生提供類比積體電路設計方面的培訓。 內容綱要： 課程分為兩階段：1)先針對大二電子學I&II兩學期課程做摘要式的複習，並加強兩課程中與類比訊號及電路分析的內容。2)深入討論MOSFET元件、並用該元件進行類比積體電路設計。

content.en:
A. 電子學精要
A1. Thévenin and Norton
A2. DC Bias Point 及 Small-Signal Models 的分別
A3. Output Current 及 Output Resistance 的分析方法
A4. BJT and MOSFET 電路分析方法之異同 (加課時段)
A5. Frequency-Response (加課時段)
B. DEVICE MODEL
Introduction to MOSFET
C. ANALOG CIRCUIT DESIGN
C1. Current Sources and Sinks
C2. Reference
C3. Amplifiers
C4. Differential Amplifiers
C5. Operational Amplifier
C6. Noise
C7. Feedback
C8. Stability and Frequency Compensation
C9. Advanced Operational Amplifier
